text: They are in Peru to give back on a charity trip. But Kylie Jenner, 19, looked a little tired as she got off a private jet with her mother Kris, 61, in Cusco, Peru with a zebra blanket wrapped around her. The mother - daughter duo are in the South American country on a medical trip to support Smile Train, an organization that provides free surgeries to repair cleft pallets for children living in developing countries. Worn out? Kylie Jenner, 19, looked a little tired as she got off a private jet with her mother Kris, 61, in Cusco, Peru with a zebra blanket wrapped around her Kylie had her dark hair up in a ponytail parted down the center and appeared to be covering up dark leggings.
